  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AndCollector
    Convenience collector to wrap a list of collectors Created by zack on 3/11/16.
    AndFilter
    Combine multiple filters Created by zack on 2/24/16.
    AtomCollector
    Collect atoms matching the scan filter.
    Collectors
    Scan atom collector factory and utils
    Filters
    Filters engine, factory, and utils Created by zack on 2/12/16.

    Results grouped by particles Created by zack on 2/25/16.
    IntervalCollector
    Collect sub-aggregated data at a given interval Created by zack on 2/19/16.
    KScanID
    Time Key Values based ScanID implementation Created by zack on 2/12/16.
    KTimestampFilter
    Time Filter by time range.
    NameFilter
    Filter by name for space or time dimension Created by zack on 2/24/16.
    NScan
    Base Scan implementation
    NScanner
    Base scanner using filters and collectors
    NSlice
    Tree structured results from a translator scan
    ParticlesFilter
    Filter non-matching partices in slices Created by zack on 2/23/16.
    SScanID
    Series based ScanID implementation Created by zack on 2/12/16.
    STimestampFilter
    Space Filter by time range.
    ValuesCollector
